channel.title: Blueprint on Dr. Elliot
channel.description: Recent content in Blueprint on Dr. Elliot

item.title: Blueprint vs C++
item.description: C++ Is Not Better Than Blueprint—They’re Just Different You’ve probably heard the argument before: “C++ is better than Blueprint.” Often, this comes from people who are new to using C++ in Unreal Engine and are riding the peak of the Dunning-Kruger effect. The truth is, one isn’t better than the other—they’re just different. It’s like comparing a knife to a fork; they are different tools for different jobs. Claiming that C++ is superior to Blueprint, comes across as arrogant.
